import React, { Component, useState, useEffect, Fragment } from "react"; import { getSiteImages, getData } from "../../helpers/api"; import CaseStudies from './home/case-studies'; import FAQ from './home/faq'; import Services from './home/services'; export default function Home() { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [state, setState] = useState({ }); useEffect(() => { getData("home").then((data) => { console.log(data); setState({ ...state, content: data.content, metatags: data.metatags, services: data.services, faqs: data.faqs, site_settings: data.site_settings }); setLoading(true); }); }, []); if (loading === false) return
; return (

The Easiest Way to Market Across Every Channel

Manage and run your multichannel marketing campaigns from start to finish with one login. Helping you improve the way you communicate with your customers across all marketing channels and devices.

  • All channel activation: display, social, out of home, radio and more!
  • Affordable, straightforward and simple to use
  • Get all the help you need with a dedicated team specialist

Become a publisher

Get in touch with us to learn how you can start monetizing your assets. From your physical store, to your app and even your website -- we can help!

Work with us!

Lumicc is hiring! We're looking for creative marketing professionals. If you're interested, contact us!

Learn More

Why LUMICC?

Ads you understand.

As life moves online, an older generation faces a digital divide

The average age of a business owner in the U.S. is 50 YO. Uncomfortable with tech, many are struggling to use modern tools to keep their business afloat. We will assign you a dedicated team specialist who will guide you every step of the way.

Expensive

Cost of advertising continues to rise dramatically

Google and YouTube’s cost per one 1,000 views (CPM) up by 108%, Facebook ad costs saw a 89% increase, TikTok went up by 92% increase and Snapchat had “the lowest” 64% increase — and they show no signs of slowing down.

Transparency

In 2021, ad fraud cost advertisers $65 billion!

Digital ad fraud is expected to reach $500 billion by 2025, which would make it the largest criminal enterprise after the drug trade. We help you make the most out of your advertising dollars by ensuring your ads are only shown to potential customers, not bots.
